A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Originally gave it 5 star. But then re watched the original trilogy and realized how forced the humour was and how bad Luke is written by Rian Johnson. Not to mention Rey's parents\, Rose\, flying Leia\, Canto Bite\, and Phasma dying. I gave it 3 stars for the throne room fight\, how good Kylo Ren and Rey are in this film and Master Yoda returning. I really wish JJ Abrams made this one. Would have been a whole lot better.
